page.title: 08WEARDALE SHOPPING SURVEY 1
page.content:
Westgate has a small co-op store/post office, a butcher's shop, an antique shop, a petrol station and a pub. Daddry Shields has no shops. St.John's Chapel has a co-op store, post office, general dealer, gift shop and 4 pubs.
We sent a survey to every pupil's home to ask" Where do you shop for these everyday items?"---------------------- ---bread, butter, sugar, tea, cereals, coffee, meat, vegetables, eggs, tooth- paste, stamps and petrol. { {RESULTS {Westgate/St Johns Chapel 220 {Stanhope 48 {Crook 36 {Bishop Auckland 88 {Another place 43.
